description: Try our easy to follow Massaman Beef Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Massaman Beef Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add onion, potato and sweet potato and cook for 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add beans and sugar. Season with fish sauce. Cook for 5 minutes or until beans are just cooked. Divide among serving bowls. Top with peanuts and coriander.
